text: Maria Louise Joensen (also known as Aura Dione; born January 21, 1985) is a Danish musician and recording artist. She has several hit songs, like "I will Love You Monday (365)" and "Friends". Dione was born in Copenhagen, Denmark. She has French and Spanish ancestry. She now lives in Los Angeles. ==References== Category:Danish singers Category:1985 births Category:Living people
title: Aura Dione
